name: Glorp
description:
Trap adventurers in your dungeon and crush them using DOOM form! Made in 5 days for the 2022 Sleeping Giant Game Jam. The theme was, Advancing Wall of Doom.

Controls:

WASD to move and squeeze through pipes

Shift to grab and release boulders (toggle)

Space Bar to activate DOOM form

How to play: 

Play as the gelatinous cube, GLORP. You're vulnerable and speedy while in your standard, green form, and slow and invincible in your DOOM form. Your goal is to trap speedy adventurers in your dungeon, and crush them with DOOM form!
